title: How to Dice Chili Peppers

steps.headline: Wash the chilies.
steps.description: Put gloves on for safe handling of the chilies, to prevent transferring the heat to your eyes.

steps.headline: Cut off and discard the end piece with the stem attached.
Cut the chilies into quarters.
steps.description: This means cutting down the middle lengthwise first, then one cut across the wide middle section.

steps.headline: Use the knife to remove the seeds and pith inside the chili pepper.
steps.description: Simply run the knife along the center of each quarter. Discard of the seeds and pith.

steps.headline: Use the knife to cut the quarters into small pieces.
steps.description: Use quick, sharp chopping actions with the knife.

text: Wash the chilies. Put gloves on for safe handling of the chilies, to prevent transferring the heat to your eyes. Cut off and discard the end piece with the stem attached.  Cut the chilies into quarters. This means cutting down the middle lengthwise first, then one cut across the wide middle section. Use the knife to remove the seeds and pith inside the chili pepper. Simply run the knife along the center of each quarter. Discard of the seeds and pith. Use the knife to cut the quarters into small pieces. Use quick, sharp chopping actions with the knife. Use as required once chopped.
